ContextSR.detail: Strong Reference to the associated Cryptographic Context

CryptographicContext.detail: cryptographic information that applies to encrypted essence tracks as a whole

ContextID.detail: Persistent Unique identifier for the context

SourceEssenceContainer.detail: Essence Container Label for the source essence, prior to encryption

CipherAlgorithm.detail: Algorithm used for Triplet encryption, if any

MICAlgorithm.detail: Algorithm used for Triplet integrity, if any

CryptographicKeyID.detail: Unique identifier for the cryptographic key

EncryptedTriplet.detail: encrypted data and cryptographic information specific to the Triplet

ContextIDLink.detail: Persistent Unique identifier for the context.associated with this Triplet

PlaintextOffset.detail: Offset within the source at which encryption starts

SourceLength.detail: Length of the value of the source Triplet

EncryptedSourceValue.detail: Encrypted Source value starting at Plaintext Offset

TrackFileID.detail: The identifier of the AS-DCP Track File containing this Triplet

SequenceNumber.detail: Sequence number of this Triplet within the Track File
